Description: Fragment with profile of small Attic black-glazed pottery bowl; low ring foot and slightly thickened rounded rim. Glazed save for band at junction of foot and wall and centre of underside, which has dot and circle. Incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 599)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1843)
